name: Only You (itch) (Zeszito, Thalarcos)
description:
After you lose everything, only true love can give it back. Solve problems, communicate with other worlds and find the path that fate had broken... but at what cost?

‘Only you’ is a 3D puzzle platformer in which the player controls two different characters that have distinct roles in puzzles and perspectives on the level.

Project made for academic purposes by:
ChinagliaFZP
Gsespinto
Thalarcos
Zeszito
